issue.title: [C++] Installation on Redhat 7.9
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17596](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17596). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Hi,

Any method I choose To install I ran to some problem (R-4.1.1. and R-4.1.2):

1. The normal install:
   
   {noformat}
